h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)
content: With the area now clear, you're free to continue up the mountain path to a large walled temple in the distance. Once you reach the final set of stairs leading up to the temple, be ready for a Cyan Bat hanging from a nearby tree to ambush you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
With the area now clear, you're free to continue up the mountain path to a large walled temple in the distance. Once you reach the final set of stairs leading up to the temple, be ready for a Cyan Bat hanging from a nearby tree to ambush you.
